rukus.text: 27|67|Kapherara bale, ‘amara o amadera pitrpurusera matite parinata haye gele'o ki amaderake bera kara habe
27|68|‘e bisaye to amaderake ebam age amadera purbapurusaderake'o pratisruti deya hayechila. E to purbabartidera upakatha chara ara kichu'i naya.’
27|69|Baluna, ‘tomara yamine paribhramana kara, atahpara dekha aparadhidera parinama kirupa hayechila [1].’
27|70|Ara tadera upara apani duhkha karabena na ebam tadera sarayantre manahksunna habena na [1].
27|71|Ara tara bale, ‘tomara yadi satyabadi ha'o tabe bala, kakhana e pratisruti purna habe?’
27|72|Baluna, ‘tomara ye bisaya tbaranbita karate caccha sambhabata tara kichu tomadera pechane ese'i ache [1]!’
27|73|Ara niscaya apanara raba manusera prati anugrahasila; kintu tadera adhikansa'i akrtajna.
27|74|Ara niscaya apanara raba, tini abasya'i janena tadera antara ya gopana kare ebam tara ya prakasa kare.
27|75|Ara asamana o yamine emana kono gopana rahasya ne'i ya suspasta kitabe ne'i.
27|76|Bani isara'ila ye saba bisaye matabheda kare, niscaya e kura'ana tara adhikansa tadera kache bibrta kare [1].
27|77|Ara niscaya eti muminadera jan'ya hedayata o rahamata.
27|78|Apanara raba to tamra bidhana anuyayi tadera madhye phayasala kare debena. Ara tini parakramasali, sarbajna.
27|79|Sutaram allah‌ra upara nirbhara karuna; apani to spasta satye pratisthita.
27|80|Mrtake to apani sonate parabena na [1], badhirake'o parabena na daka sunate, yakhana tara pitha phiriye cale yaya.
27|81|Apani andhaderake'o tadera patha bhrastata theke pathe anate parabena na. Apani to kebala taderake sonate parabena, yara amadera nidarsanabalite imana ane. Atahpara tara'i atmasamarpanakari.

27|82|Ara yakhana tadera upara ghosita sasti asabe takhana amara tadera jan'ya yamina theke eka jiba bera karaba [1], ya tadera sathe katha balabe [2] ye, manusa amadera nidarsanasamuhe niscita bisbasa karata na.
